mention.text: a clandestine leftist group that promotes `` all forms of struggle '' against the military government headed by general augusto pinochet
the fpmr , which on 14 december will mark 6 years of subversive activity
the military government headed by general augusto pinochet
the `` armed branch '' of the outlawed communist party of chile
